original: intros x n m Hx Hdiv. unfold divides in Hdiv. destruct Hdiv as [q Hdiv]. rewrite <- Hdiv. rewrite <- power_mult_lemma1. rewrite power_power_lemma1. rewrite mult_comm. rewrite <- Nat.lt_eq_cases in Hx. destruct Hx as [Hx | Hx]. - apply Nat.log2_spec in Hx. rewrite Nat.lt_succ_pred in Hx. apply le_plus_minus in Hx. rewrite Hx. apply le_gt_S. apply power_mult_lemma1. - apply Nat.lt_irrefl in Hx. contradiction.
